= commands =
	* prefix - ~~C-x~~
	* show panel number - ~~prefix+q~~
	* delete panel or tab - ~~C-d/exit~~
	* attach session - ~~tmuxa [num] (use fzf)~~
	* kill session - ~~tmuxkill [num]~~
	* move through panels - ~~C-h/j/k/l~~
	* resize panel - ~~option-h/j/k/l~~
	* rename panel - ~~prefix-,~~
	* move to other window - ~~prefix-p/n~~
	* create panel - ~~prefix-c~~
	* save session - ~~prefix-C-s~~
	* restore session - ~~prefix-C-r~~
	* tmux spotify - ~~prefix-s~~
